"Green New Deal" - A comprehensive plan to address climate change by transitioning to renewable energy sources, investing in public transportation, and creating green jobs.
"Medicare for All" - A single-payer healthcare system that provides coverage to all Americans regardless of their income or pre-existing conditions.
"Progressive Taxation" - A tax system that places a higher tax burden on wealthy individuals and corporations to fund social programs and infrastructure projects.
"Guaranteed Basic Income" - A program that provides a monthly stipend to all citizens regardless of their employment status, with the goal of reducing poverty and promoting economic stability.
"Electoral College Reform" - A proposal to modify the current system of electing the President of the United States by changing the number of electoral votes each state receives
